name: SKTileSet
desc: A container for related tile groups.

items.name: init?(named: String)
items.desc: Initializes a tile set by searching the app bundle for an archived .sks file by name.

items.name: init?(from: URL)
items.desc: Initializes a tile set from a URL to an archived .sks file.

items.name: init(tileGroups: [SKTileGroup])
items.desc: Initializes a new tile set with an array of tile groups and rectangular grid layout.

items.name: init(tileGroups: [SKTileGroup], tileSetType: SKTileSetType)
items.desc: Initializes a new tile set with an array of tile groups and specified layout.

items.name: var defaultTileGroup: SKTileGroup?
items.desc: The tile set's default tile group.

items.name: var defaultTileSize: CGSize
items.desc: The tile set's default tile size.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: A name associated with the tile set.

items.name: var tileGroups: [SKTileGroup]
items.desc: The tile set's array of tile group objects.

items.name: enum SKTileSetType
items.desc: An enumeration defining how tiles are arranged.
